title: Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When I then useCtrl+M (Add Import) nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace withinthe selection.
EB: "Node " instead of "Node"because I made my selection by using "Shift + Ctrl + Right".
SR: It often happens to me that I have selected i.e. When I then useCtrl+M (Add Import) nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace withinthe selection.
